bike.description: Hi-Ten plain gauge steel, 20.5" top tube, externally relieved MID BB shell, integrated headtube, seatstay-mounted U-brake bosses, 5mm thick dropouts for 14mm axle

Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy style, full cartridge bearings
BMX stem, die-cast alloy, top load, 50mm, 22.2mm clamp
Specialized P.Series BMX bar, Hi-Ten steel, 710mm wide, 11-degree backsweep, 2-degree upsweep, 210mm rise, 22.2mm
P.Grip BMX, w/ flange, Kraton, end plugs, 150mm
Tektro, U-brake, die-cast, single bushing, coil spring, 15mm offset arms
Tektro XL-320, U-brake lever, 15mm cable pull
1 pc. CNC, 9T driver
KMC Z-510H
P.Crank, 3pc. Cr-Mo, tubular arms, 8-spline, 170mm
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearings w/ 19mm, 8-spline spindle
Plastic platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16"
P.Series 20", alloy double-wall, triple void, 35mm, 36h
P.Series BMX, alloy, loose ball, solid axle, 36h
P.Series BMX, alloy, loose ball, hollow axle, 36h
Stainless, 14g (2.0mm)
Specialized Compound Street, 30TPI, wire bead, 20x2.3"
Specialized Compound Street, 30TPI, wire bead, 20x2.3"
Standard Schrader valve

Alloy, 25.4mm, integrated w/ saddle
